author: bogdan vosloban
comment: there's room for improvement and more features. for example some more coding recipes would help newbies get going with their own design ideas. also making it easier to build your own watchface would be a good road to go. I enjoy the layers type of tools available but some copy pasting between your own designs wouldn't hurt. also making sure that the steps counter shows the same values as Google Fit would create less confusion regarding the sensors accuracy... these are the reasons why I give it 4*... for now

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: Many thanks for your feedback - look out for these features soon! WatchMaker is the largest watchface platform and community in the world. We have over 2 million users and 40,000 watchfaces - more are added every day!

author: Vladimir Premeru
comment: So far, I'm impressed. I just don't understand if all watch faces have (or if we can somehow activate in the app) the burn-in protection for OLED screens. Let me know!

author: Paul Middleton
comment: Paid for it, but still wants me to buy watch faces. My watch faces keep changing on their own. Have to hunt down my default choice again. App could be better organised and simpler to use

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: You get 40,000 faces for $3.99 (WatchMaker premium option) - no additional payment needed! Use the search options and Top Premium list. Get 15,000+ faces on getwatchmaker.com, 20,000 faces on facerepo.com and 10,000 faces on WatchMaker G+!

author: Austin Acker
comment: After paying for the app it wanted me to pay more so I could supposedly get faces.  All the faces cost more money.  I would like a refund.

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: You get 40,000 faces for $3.99 (WatchMaker premium option) - no additional payment needed! Use the search options and Top Premium list. Get 15,000+ faces on getwatchmaker.com, 20,000 faces on facerepo.com and 10,000 faces on WatchMaker G+!

author: Chris Bartlett
comment: Now that I have spent a little more time working with the app, I love it. I admit that I got frustrated at first, but a few Google searches and i was able to resolve my issues.  Looking forward to playing with this more.

author: Billy Jackson
comment: Worst app ever. Forces you to download some hidden "Samsung Billing" app that constantly gives a pop-up error. Most of the faces are paid items, even after paying for the app.

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: The Samsung companion app is $1.99 - please update Samsung Billing. You get 40,000 faces for $3.99 (WatchMaker premium option) - no additional payment needed! Use the search options and Top Premium list. Get 15,000+ faces on getwatchmaker.com, 20,000 faces on facerepo.com and 10,000 faces on WatchMaker G+!

author: Jason cleaver
comment: Good app, everything works as it should.. I don't create any faces this is just easy to import them from the supported links.

author: Anil Kakde
comment: Awesome app. I'm 40 and I play with this thing all the time! It even quenches the developer and designer thirsts in it

author: Jim Stump
comment: I love this app! The only thing that would make it better is if it had an option to group items while designing a watchface to allow moving or modding the whole group. Thanks for an otherwise awesome app!

author: Ken Hopkins
comment: It seems really nice.  Too bad I can't load the watch face that I paid for.

author: Leland Cox
comment: App needs help info. Easy to use after you get it figured out. Where is the manual?

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: Full instructions here http://watchmaker.haz.wiki/start or on our G+ community - the largest smartwatch community in the world! WatchMaker is the largest watchface platform and community in the world. We have over 2 million users and 40,000 watchfaces - more are added every day!

author: Tim Browning
comment: LOADS of faces available from the G+ group, more than you could possibly need. Excellent app and I haven't even tried to make my own face yet.

author: John Tedder
comment: This works for me insofar as it is allowing me to design my own watch faces, could maybe do with a bit more guidance and help but so far better than the alternatives.

author: Steve Smith
comment: Samsung Gear S3.... Much more stable than Facer. Also seems to load faster.

author: Jodi Hodge
comment: I love this app. Just made a watch face for each day with my own pictures and customized where I want everything with colors. Gave a 4 because it was a $4 purchase. But pretty much worth it.

author: Daniel Taylor
comment: This is the best thing ever to release for Android Wear yes it will cost you £3.99 or whatever for the license but so worth it when you can have over 40,000 brands and designs to choose from and even create your own and with the complications API embedded ,must have staple for any Android Wear or Tizen (Samsung Gear Series)

author: Jeremy Guillot
comment: Very easy to use and almost fully customizable!

author: Myron Rich
comment: I've used this application for years. It is great!

author: SiddiQ Newton Abdul-Hakim
comment: Difficult ui to get free faces. They also failed to mention that to get the free faces you have to pay 1.99 for the companion app then 3.99 for the lifetime membership

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: The 1.99 is for Samsung Gear companion - it is mentioned in the app description. You get access to 40,000+ watchfaces for the $3.99 purchase of this app (WatchMaker Premium option)! More watches are added every day! This is the best deal on any smartwatch app period.

author: thejudge-84 Mike
comment: Charges you for the companion app then again for membership then again for a different set of faces would prefer 1 set price on download not multiple hidden costs that been said it is a decent enough app easy to use and customize

reply.author: androidslide
reply.content: WatchMaker is the largest watch face community in the world. Get the phone app from Samsung Galaxy Apps or Google Play for $3.99 - then you have 40,000 faces for $5.99! You can even create your own faces!

author: Paul Macknamara
comment: Some nice designs are available if you buy premium.  Now I need to start designing my own watch faces.

author: Avijit Singh
comment: I want to know that I just purchased a pack of premium but unable to install that 290 Rs pack, kindly check it asap

author: Brain Freeze
comment: Takes a while to get a hang of but the payoff is worth it

author: moh bitar
comment: Very handy application

author: Carlos Ruiz Esparza
comment: Great app for my Samsung Gear S2

author: Filipe Fleming
comment: Premium license doesn't worth. The paid still paid.

author: Deron Smith
comment: It's alright
Nice application and watch faces

author: hitendra barse
comment: Nice app helps me to get lots of watch faces

author: Andrew Protheroe
comment: Great app for changing the watch face on my Moto 360 watch

author: Marja Veenendaal
comment: Geest selection of watch faces that can be customized

author: Narendra Galvankar
comment: World's ultimate watch faces  ever.

author: Tony Mitten
comment: Just what I was looking for top job

author: Robb
comment: Easy to use. Great selection of watchfaces.

author: Matthew Weaver
comment: Plenty of great watch faces

author: Chuck Kephart
comment: Some app's  it up to par..

author: Nathan Hale
comment: Eh

author: david trujillo
comment: Very good

author: Brumme Gazz
comment: Brilliant ap

author: Abe Watt
comment: Great app
